mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_club_apply ( bno, appli_user_no, club_id, status, apply_date ) VALUES ( #{bno}, #{appli_user_no}, #{club_id}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_club_apply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND appli_user_no = #{appli_user_no} AND status = 'canceled' AND apply_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_club_member ( club_id, user_no, role, joined_at ) VALUES ( #{club_id}, #{user_no}, 'MEMBER', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.user_name FROM tbl_club_apply a JOIN `user` u ON a.appli_user_no = u.user_no WHERE a.club_id = #{club_id} ORDER BY a.apply_date DESC
